JavaPlugin.name: Ifc Object collection for analysis
JavaPlugin.description: Returns a Json dataset that can easily be represented in COTS analysis tools

JavaPlugin.name: Collect and aggregate components and materials
JavaPlugin.description: Returns a Json dataset that can easily be represented in the ReStore client

JavaPlugin.name: Collect root component by type based on their name, type and materials
JavaPlugin.description: Returns a Json dataset composed of root components, sorted by type and dimensions
